feature_panel.email_automation_description: Right person, right message, right time
feature_panel.email_automation_remarks: Send 100% personalized Emails according to the behavior and interests of your Subscribers. Save time and money!
feature_panel.email_editor_description: Crea Emails en minutos y accede a nuestra Galería de Plantillas
feature_panel.email_editor_remarks: Nuestras Plantillas para Email son totalmente Responsive y fácilmente editables desde nuestro Editor HTML.
feature_panel.forms_description: Add new contacts to your Lists using custom Forms
feature_panel.forms_remarks: Classics and pop-ups with Single or Double Opt-In subscription. You decide how you want them to look, what data to request and where to place them!

login.you_want_create_account: Do not you have an account yet?

reports.datahub_not_active_HTML:
How do users behave on your Website or E-commerce? Track their behavior for a period of time and find out which are the most visited pages, how many of those visits have an Email identified by Doppler and how many don’t. By tracking the user’s journey you'll be able to detect vanishing points and opportunities for improvement!

You haven’t enabled On-Site Tracking yet. You can trigger it from the On-Site Tracking option in the Control Panel.
reports.datahub_not_active_title: Track user behavior and optimize your Marketing actions
reports.datahub_not_domains_title: Track user behavior and optimize your Marketing actions
reports.no_domains_HTML:
How do users behave on your Website or E-commerce? Track their behavior for a period of time and find out which are the most visited pages, how many of those visits have an Email identified by Doppler and how many don’t. By tracking the user’s journey you'll be able to detect vanishing points and opportunities for improvement!

You haven’t added a domain yet. You can do so in the On-Site Tracking option in the Control Panel.

reports_box.visits_description: This report shows the total number of visits in the selected time period

reports_filters.description: Find conversion opportunities, analyze each piece within your strategy. Follow the steps that your users perform within your journey and correct those that have problems.
reports_filters.title: Optimize your Digital Marketing strategy

signup.activate_account_instructions: * By clicking on the button from the Email, you will activate your account and you will be ready to enjoy all the benefits of Doppler.
signup.check_inbox: Check your inbox. You have an email!
signup.copyright_HTML: © {year} Doppler LLC. All rights reserved. Privacy and Legal Policy.
signup.head_description: Attract, engage and convert clients using the Email Marketing Automation power. Try out Doppler!
signup.head_title: Free Email Marketing Automation with no sending limits | Doppler
signup.legal_HTML:
Doppler te informa que los datos de carácter personal que nos proporciones al rellenar el presente formulario serán tratados por Making Sense LLC (Doppler) como responsable de esta web.

Finalidad: Darte de alta en nuestra plataforma y brindarte los servicios que nos requieras.

Legitimación: Consentimiento del interesado.

Destinatarios: Tus datos serán guardados por Doppler, Zoho como CRM, Digital Ocean, Cogeco Peer1 y Rackspace como empresas de hosting.

Información adicional: En la Privacy Policy de Doppler encontrarás información adicional sobre la recopilación y el uso de su información personal por parte de Doppler, incluida información sobre acceso, conservación, rectificación, eliminación, seguridad, transferencias transfronterizas y otros temas.
signup.no_more_resend: You haven't received the Email yet? We have already forwarded it to you, if it doesn't arrive in the next few minutes, please contact support
signup.placeholder_email: Your Email will be your Username
signup.promotions_consent: Sign me up for promotions about Doppler and its partners.
signup.recaptcha_legal_HTML: This site is protected by reCAPTCHA and the Google Privacy Policy and Terms of Service apply.
signup.sign_up_sub: No contracts or credit cards required, up to 500 Subscribers.
